title: Shrimp Sauté

ingredients.content: 16 oz large raw shrimp, peeled, deveined, tails removed
dried red chili flakes, to garnish

preparations.content: Place ginger, coconut cream, sambal oelek, cornstarch, sugar and salt into mixing bowl and without measuring cup, cook <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Transfer to a small bowl and set aside.
Place vegetable oil into mixing bowl, insert measuring cup and heat <b>3 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.

Add half the reserved sauce and snow peas and cook <b>2 min/250°F//speed 1<b>. Transfer into a serving bowl, garnish with sliced green onions and red chili flakes and serve immediately with remaining sauce.

hintsAndTricks: If using frozen shrimp, ensure to thaw and dry before using.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro leaves.
Serve remaining sauce over steamed rice.
